gramGrp.pos:
COUNT N
or
UNCOUNT N
with
SUPP

sense.def:
One's reaction to something
je tisto, kar čutimo, rečemo ali naredimo zaradi nečesa.

seg.quote: My immediate reaction was one of revulsion.

sense.def:
A reaction against something
je vedênje ali ukrepanje, ki je namerno drugačno od prejšnjega.

seg.quote: My work has never been a reaction against Abstract Expressionism.

sense.def:
Kadar obstaja
a reaction against something
, je tisto nepriljubljeno.

seg.quote: This led to a reaction against public expenditure.

sense.def:
One's reactions
je človekova sposobnost, da hitro ukrepa, ko se znajde v določenih okoliščinah ali ko zazna določene dražljaje, na primer ko se znajde v nevarnosti.

seg.quote: ...a computer game designed to time their reactions.

sense.def:
A chemical reaction
je dogajanje, pri katerem se dve snovi kemično spojita, tako da nastane nova snov.
